column5: On the water by 9 with my dad and two buddies. Fish bit almost off the hop and big perch especially. One in the 14 range(fat) and several 11-13". Kept abot 25 between us and tossed the big girls back. Dead action from 12-2 , but then back on. Last Tuesday jigging rap outproduced minnows with an agressive jig. Today complete opposite with a deadstick. Saw huge schools under the shade of the fish trap. 12 -13 fow . Marmooska jigs and Genz worms were the ticket tipped with a minnow or minnow head. 9-10 inches of ice in most places around the huts. 3 trucks out there today??????????? Play safe and bring cleats if you got em'. Tomorrow is a Crappie hunt. Will post pics soon. Gotta get up for 4am and didn't get them off the camera tonight.
good report  I must get off my butt and get over to virginia beach....  you didn't come all the way down from north bay to fish simcoe did you
Nice report. And we are going to have more and more fat girls.
Nice to see your back in the area and fishing already Derek. Keep the reports coming.  Mike
I am Now living in Hamilton but i was driving down from North Bay last winter. Addicted to Simcoe is the disease i have...lol I will post the pics tonight.
Good Job man!!! I hear Virginia is out producing Gilford bigtime!!! Where should I go tomorrow morning!!!!
Now that's a fishing report people!!  Lots of good detail and useful info in there Derek, nice job.  I'd take that report with no pictures over 10 pics with no information.  Well done!!  Cheers, ben.
Simcoe fishing can be alot of fun and sometimes non-stop action. Worth the drive.  Keep the reports coming

Great report !!!..  .and yes it was pretty steady for a while this morning,myself and dan,a.k.a  percher ,well we went out of gilford this morning and kept 25 and released at least 2 times that many !!!!!..some were real nice but yes lots of small ones as well...cheers

Thanks for the compliment on the report. Virgiia is really producing some big perch right now. I was going to go to Keswick but i think the ice is better in Virginia and the schools contain more #s of bigger jumbos. Back out tomorrow for some crappie or lakers. Can't decide. Cheers
